content.question: A river has width <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>W</mi></math> and current <math alttext="v sub r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub></math>. A boat maintains a constant velocity as it travels from Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> to Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>. Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> is located at a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> upstream from Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>. The boat’s water speed is <math alttext="v sub b w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></math> with a heading of angle <math alttext="theta sub b w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></math>, as shown in the figure. Which of the following is a correct expression for <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub b w, end sub, minus v sub r, close parenthesis, times the fraction W over v sub b w, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>W</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub b w, end sub, times the sine of theta sub b w, end sub, minus v sub r, close parenthesis, times, the fraction W over v sub b w, end sub, times the cosine of theta sub b w, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub b w, end sub, times the cosine of theta sub b w, end sub, minus v sub r, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, the fraction W over v sub b w, end sub, times the sine of theta sub b w, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub b w, end sub, times the cosine of theta sub b w, end sub, plus v sub r, close parenthesis, times, the fraction W over v sub b w, end sub, times the sine of theta sub b w, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, v sub b w, end sub, times the sine of theta sub b w, end sub, minus v sub r, close parenthesis, times, the fraction W over v sub b w, end sub, times the cosine of theta sub b w, end sub, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>sin</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>r</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>W</mi><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub><mi>cos</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mtext>bw</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Motion in Two or Three Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
